para.text: Except as otherwise provided in §B of this regulation, all contested case hearings before the Board are governed by COMAR 09.01.02.
The administrative unit shall send the hearing notice described in COMAR 09.01.02.07B at least 30 days before the hearing.

section.heading: Hearings Delegated to the Office of Administrative Hearings.
section.text: All contested case hearings delegated to the Office of Administrative Hearings are governed by COMAR 09.01.03.

annotations.annotation: State Government Article, §10-204; Business Occupations and Professions Article, §§14-205 and 14-208; Annotated Code of Maryland
Chapter revised effective September 28, 1992 (19:19 Md. R. 1705)
Regulations .01—.08 repealed and new Regulations .01 and .02 adopted effective March 1, 2004 (31:4 Md. R. 314)
